my_business:
SVB Chits India Pvt Ltd is a company registered under The Companies Act 1956 & Chit funds Act 1982, managed by seasoned professionals.
Chit funds is a mechanism that combines borrowing & saving in a single scheme which is equivalent to ROSCA that are famous through out the world.
We at SVB Chits are committed to assure the highest yield & safest returns, backed by high values & ethics. Also the chit amount can be withdrawn in lump sum for meeting any need during contingency.
top_product: Chit Group of 5 lac ~ 20 months starting by October 2014
ideal_referral: A business owner who is looking to save for his future projects / existing business expansion / personal commitments.

Immediate after the meeting I took a decission to join BNI representing my family run business & to resign my job. Now almost a year has happened & feeling great in identifying the right way to success with support of fellow BNI Admirals.
